Mukhyamantri Yuva Swavalamban Yojana (MY.details: A scholarship scheme for economically weaker section students in Gujarat pursuing higher education like diploma courses, engineering, pharmacy, medical, etc.
benefits: Tuition fee grant
Hostel grant
Book/instruments grant
Age relaxation for government jobs
Training for competitive exams
Financial assistance for students in GMERS and dental courses
application_process: Apply online through the official portal

Vahli Dikri Yojana.details: A scheme aimed at empowering girl children by providing financial assistance to their parents to encourage education and reduce school dropout rates.
benefits: Cash incentives at different stages of education
Free education
Insurance coverage
application_process: Apply through the official portal or designated centers

Educational Award Scheme - Gujarat Labou.details: Implemented to encourage children of laborers to pursue higher education by providing financial awards based on academic performance.
benefits: ₹2,500 for students scoring 70% and above in 10th Standard
₹5,000 for students scoring 70% and above in 12th Standard
eligibility: Children of laborers working in factories/institutes in Gujarat
Parents contributing to the Labour Welfare Fund
Students scoring 70% and above in 10th or 12th Standard
application_process: Register on the Sanman Portal: https://sanman.gujarat.gov.in/
Submit the application and await confirmation

Educational Study Scheme.details: Provides affordable education loans to students pursuing undergraduate and postgraduate professional courses.
benefits: Loan up to ₹10,00,000 or total tuition fee, whichever is less
Simple interest rate of 4% per annum
eligibility: Passed Class 12 with at least 60% marks
Family income of ₹6.00 lakhs or less
application_process: Apply online through the official portal
Submit the application along with required documents to the concerned authority

NAMO E-Tablet Scheme.details: Provides tablets to students studying in colleges and universities in Gujarat to promote digital learning.
benefits: Free tablets preloaded with educational content
4G connectivity
7-inch screen size
eligibility: Students enrolled in first-year college or polytechnic courses in Gujarat

Bhagwan Budhdh Scholarship.details: Provides financial assistance to Scheduled Caste girl students in Gujarat for post-SSC studies.
benefits: Academic allowance based on course group and hostel/day scholar status
Approved tuition and other fees
Disability allowance if applicable
application_process: Complete profile and apply for the scholarship
Submit the application and await approval

Foreign Education Scheme.details: Provides financial assistance for non-reserved category students pursuing higher education abroad after Standard 12.
benefits: Loan assistance for tuition fees and living expenses
Support for students admitted to recognized foreign universities

Education Assistance/Ph.D Scheme (GBOCWW.details: Provides financial assistance once a year to two children of a construction worker for pursuing higher education.
benefits: Annual financial assistance for educational expenses
Support for students from Class I up to professional courses
eligibility: Children of construction workers registered with the Gujarat Building and Other Construction Workers Welfare Board
Enrollment in any grade from Class I up to higher education or professional courses

Post-Matric Scholarships for Scheduled C.details: Provides financial assistance to Scheduled Caste students for pursuing post-matriculation education.
benefits: Scholarship covering tuition fees and other allowances
Support for various post-matric courses
